verses.roman:
kṛṣṇa-nāma, kṛṣṇa-guṇa, kṛṣṇa-līlā-vṛnda
kṛṣṇera svarūpa-sama--saba cid-ānanda

synonyms: kṛṣṇa-nāma—the holy name of Kṛṣṇa; kṛṣṇa-guṇa—the transcendental qualities of Kṛṣṇa; kṛṣṇa-līlā-vṛnda—the transcendental pastimes of Lord Kṛṣṇa; kṛṣṇera sva-rūpa—Kṛṣṇa's personality; sama—equal; saba—all; cit-ānanda—spiritual and full of bliss.
translation: "The holy name of Kṛṣṇa, His transcendental qualities and pastimes as well as Lord Kṛṣṇa Himself are all equal. They are all spiritual and full of bliss.
